quotes.name: George R.R. Martin
quotes.quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one.

quotes.name: Stephen King
quotes.quote: Books are a uniquely portable magic.

quotes.name: Dr. Seuss
quotes.quote: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.

quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway
quotes.quote: There is no friend as loyal as a book.

quotes.name: Charles W. Eliot
quotes.quote: Books are the quietest and most constant of friends; they are the most accessible and wisest of counselors, and the most patient of teachers.

quotes.name: Jorge Luis Borges
quotes.quote: I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library.

quotes.name: Neil Gaiman
quotes.quote: A book is a dream that you hold in your hand.

quotes.name: Mary Schmich
quotes.quote: Reading is a discount ticket to everywhere.

quotes.name: Carlos Ruiz Zaf√≥n
quotes.quote: Books are mirrors: you only see in them what you already have inside you.

quotes.name: William Styron
quotes.quote: A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading.
